long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a lightweight plugin that gives you the option to remove the Related Results and/or the Shorts from your search queries.
It does this and only this. 
Ultimately, the intention is to see 100% your results and not the distracting recommendations.
You can always toggle them back on without reloading the page.
Let me know in the reviews if you'd like any updates.
